price: Kun (adaba keessanii), isa dhandhamaa, Dhugumatti kaafirootaaf adabbii ibiddaatu jira.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
